name: Supernova Framework
body:
### About / Acerca de
> Supernova is a lightweight MVC PHP Framework wich can handle small and large projects. Based on VanillaPHP and CakePHP, with a database design based on Oracle. Our purpose is to allow the development of secure and stable webapps in a few line of codes
---
Supernova es un Framework MVC PHP liviano que puede manejar proyectos peque침os y grandes. Basado en VanillaPHP y CakePHP, con dise침o de base de datos basado en Oracle, Nuestro prop칩sito es permitir el desarrollo de aplicaciones web seguras y estables en unas pocas lineas de c칩digo

### Authors and Contributors

Authors: @ArkangelKruel @mrpuck
Contributors: @mauricioschneider

### Pull-request and Issues

> Both are welcome. We are trying to migrate our phpDocs to the gitHub Wiki as soon as posible...
---
Ambos son bienvenidos. Estamos tratando de migrar los phpDocs a la wikide gitHub lo mas pronto posible...
